name: Swinth
overview: SWINTH is a music visualization game, inhabiting the realm where a SpiroGraph, amazing music and your imagination meet. The game came on a 5.25" floppy disk and it included 10 songs for SWINTH and the visualzation graphics for it. The visualization was a number of randomly moving lines that changed colors periodically. This could be changed by pressing one of 17 keys: V(vertical), H(horizontal), I(changes MAX increment), E(toggles MIN increment), F1,3 and 5 changes the color but F7 toggles random colors, and numbers 0-9 changes length of tail. The RUN/STOP key terminates SWINTH while SPACE plays the next song. SWINTH is considered a classic and is favored today by many.
